pr_title: CorfuStore: Stream tails per table api needed for search

timeline.message: CorfuStore: Stream tails per table api needed for search

timeline.author: WenbinZhu
pankti-m

timeline.bodyText: should we add an api in CorfuStore for this?  Otherwise users will directly access the table
timeline.author: pankti-m

replies.bodyText: We can, but I am strictly following the ask, that's why I put it here. we do expose the table directly anyway in UFO
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.bodyText: can we rename the test to something more explanatory?  something like testSecondaryIndexes()
timeline.author: pankti-m

timeline.message:
CorfuStore: Stream tails per table api needed for search

Minor fix to getRecord() to handle null values.

CorfuStore: Stream tails per table api needed for search

Minor fix to getRecord() to handle null values.
Use getOrCreate on SharedMetricRegistry for compatability with 3.1.0
